headline: Keysight Expands Double-Pulse Test Portfolio for Wide-Bandgap Chips
summary: KEYS unveils a solder-free solution for precise Wide-Bandgap chip testing, reducing parasitics and enabling faster, more accurate characterization.

raw.headline: Keysight Expands Double-Pulse Test Portfolio for Wide-Bandgap Chips
raw.summary: KEYS unveils a solder-free solution for precise Wide-Bandgap chip testing, reducing parasitics and enabling faster, more accurate characterization.

headline: Keysight Introduces AI Network Visibility to Enhance Cybersecurity
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., March 18, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) announces the expansion of its Keysight Vision Network Packet Brokers (NPBs), with the introduction of AI Insight Brokers. These enhanced NPBs are designed to improve the performance of AI-driven cybersecurity operations such as threat detection, incident response, and forensics. The AI Insight Broker is purpose built to support and leverage the capabilities of AI software, including Keysight’s newly developed AI Stack.
